swipe Class

Defined in: application/static/scripts/src/lib/swipe.js:1
Module: init

Initialize the swipe functionality for different sliders on the page.

Defined in application/static/scripts/src/lib/swipe.js:53

init

(
  • container
  • slider
  • elems
  • indicatorElem
)
IScroll

Defined in application/static/scripts/src/lib/swipe.js:10

Bootstrap the swipe.

Parameters:

  • container String

    Element which contains the slider, must specify whether class or ID (ex. '.news-slider-container')

  • slider String

    Element class or ID name, which contains the items

  • elems String

    Element class or ID name of the items

  • indicatorElem String

    Parent element of the scroll bar

Returns:

IScroll:

IScroll object
